title: If you had to recommend one affiliate marketing book to those trying to make $10,000 a month or more from it, what would it be? - Quora

response.answer_text: Expert Secrets by Russell Brunson. It’s about positioning yourself as an expert and providing your audience a new opportunity. And getting people to pay you for your advice. Of course you shouldn’t pretend to be an expert if you know nothing about the topic but don’t be shy if you really do know your stuff. Lots of the successful affiliate marketers are seen as experts in the area of affiliate marketing. That’s why they can sell courses, sell coaching, sell affiliate products that they recommend to their audience. In these courses and coaching they sometimes recommend affiliate products to their audience if its needed or helpful, so they get a commission as well. Promoting affiliate products through YouTube, blogs, ads etc are probably how you would start out as an affiliate marketer but that’s not where the big and fast money is. Use your success from promoting affiliate products to position yourself as someone who knows enough to help others achieve the same result. Build a following (providing free and valuable content on Facebook, Youtube, etc) that trusts you who will buy what you recommend. You can offer coaching - if you’re earning $100 per month, someone who’s earning $1 per month might pay you to learn how to get to $100 per month (but don’t lie or pretend). Eventually you can build a course that can help scale up your earnings because your course can sell even when you’re sleeping. And in your courses and coaching you’re recommending affiliate products so you’re still building up your affiliate commissions from promoting products. Ultimately, positioning yourself as an expert and creating a new opportunity for your audience is going to get you to the $10,000 per month. The book Expert Secrets tells you the most effective process of doing that so I highly recommend it. You can get it here.

My book of course,“The Ultimate Guide To Online Marketing”! To make this kind of money you would need: An awesome business model which lets you focus solely on marketing and getting targeted visitors to a range of digital products.A marketing strategy which allows global advertising and the ability to keep scaling up.Two kinds of business model for this description well: affiliate marketing and drop shipping. By setting up an automated product system of some kind, like both of these models, marketers can focus solely on the “front-end” marketing side of their business. To become successful, they would need to test and measure hundreds of adverts using various different audiences and marketing strategies until they find those “veins of gold” which bring in sales consistently. When they do, they can scale up those adverts while moving on to others. Continually doing this and learning from past mistakes is what successful online marketer do. It takes time and effort but ultimately they are building a strategy to create income on near “auto-pilot”.
